assessment_item.title: ವಿಶ್ವ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆಗೆ ಕಾರಣವಾದ ನಾಯಕರ ಗುಂಪು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ವಿಶ್ವ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆಗೆ ಕಾರಣವಾದ ನಾಯಕರ ಗುಂಪು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಡಿಗಾಲೆ, ಚರ್ಚಿಲ್, ಟ್ರೂಮನ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6508"},{"text":"

ಚರ್ಚಿಲ್, ಸ್ಟ್ಯಾಲಿನ್, ಎಫ್‍ಡಿ. ರೂಸ್‍ವೆಲ್ಟ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:6509"},{"text":"

ಮಾರ್ಷಲ್, ಟ್ರೂಮನ್, ಡಿಗಾಲೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6519"},{"text":"

ಟ್ರೂಮನ್, ಚರ್ಚಿಲ್, ಸ್ಟ್ಯಾಲಿನ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:6524"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ವಿಶ್ವ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆಗೆ ಕಾರಣವಾದ ನಾಯಕರ ಗುಂಪು ","title":"ವಿಶ್ವ ಸಂಸ್ಥೆಯ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆಗೆ ಕಾರಣವಾದ ನಾಯಕರ ಗುಂಪು ","board":"State (Karnataka)","medium":"Kannada","gradeLevel":["Class 10"],"subject":"Social Studies","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
